Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Class TableDescriptorBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TableDescriptorBuilder
@Public public class TableDescriptorBuilder extends Object
Convenience class for composing an instance of TableDescriptor.
Since:
2.0.0

    • CP_HTD_ATTR_VALUE_PATTERN

      private static final Pattern CP_HTD_ATTR_VALUE_PATTERN
       Pattern that matches a coprocessor specification. Form is:
 <coprocessor jar file location> '|' <class name> ['|' <priority> ['|' <arguments>]]
 where arguments are <KEY> '=' <VALUE> [,...]
 For example: hdfs:///foo.jar|com.foo.FooRegionObserver|1001|arg1=1,arg2=2

    • CP_HTD_ATTR_VALUE_PARAM_KEY_PATTERN

      private static final String CP_HTD_ATTR_VALUE_PARAM_KEY_PATTERN
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CP_HTD_ATTR_VALUE_PARAM_VALUE_PATTERN

      private static final String CP_HTD_ATTR_VALUE_PARAM_VALUE_PATTERN
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CP_HTD_ATTR_VALUE_PARAM_PATTERN

      private static final Pattern CP_HTD_ATTR_VALUE_PARAM_PATTERN

    • CP_HTD_ATTR_KEY_PATTERN

      private static final Pattern CP_HTD_ATTR_KEY_PATTERN

    • parseFrom

      public static TableDescriptor parseFrom(byte[] pbBytes) throws DeserializationException
      The input should be created by toByteArray(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TableDescriptor).
      Parameters:
      pbBytes - A pb serialized TableDescriptor instance with pb magic prefix
      Returns:
      This instance serialized with pb with pb magic prefix
      Throws:
      DeserializationException - if an error occurred

    • setReplicationScope

      public TableDescriptorBuilder setReplicationScope(int scope)
      Sets replication scope all & only the columns already in the builder. Columns added later won't be backfilled with replication scope.
      Parameters:
      scope - replication scope
      Returns:
      a TableDescriptorBuilder

    • setRegionServerGroup

      public TableDescriptorBuilder setRegionServerGroup(String group)
      Set the RSGroup for this table, specified RSGroup must exist before create or modify table.
      Parameters:
      group - rsgroup name
      Returns:
      a TableDescriptorBuilder
